name: Spellgroove (Working Title)
description:
Spellgroove is an arena-based spellcasting discofest. Dance, style, and spellcast your way through a gauntlet of dangerous enemies on your way to fame and glory in this groovy beat-em-up! There’s one catch though: all your spells are randomized every half-minute!

We're currently a few weeks into development, so we appreciate any feedback for our game! Here's a quick 2 minute survey if you want to send feedback directly: https://forms.gle/T72nhoV9D7L8taqw8
